name: Digital Marketplace
target_users: Local, state and federal government buyers and sellers of digital services are the primary user groups.

notes.title: What is the Digital Marketplace?
notes.body: As part of the National Innovation and Science Agenda, the DTA is delivering the Digital Marketplace. The current Beta release provides a richer and simpler environment for technology procurement, enabling businesses, especially SMEs and start-ups, to provide specialist digital services to government. The vision is to create an end-to-end digital environment that accommodates the level of simplicity, creativity and structure appropriate to each procurement interaction.

notes.title: Who is the user group of the Digital Marketplace?
notes.body: Local, state and federal government buyers and sellers of digital services are the primary user groups.

notes.title: Metrics relating to the operations of the marketplace will be published as the data becomes available.

widgets.name: Total opportunities
widgets.description: This is the total number of requests for digital services or specialists published by government buyers in the Digital Marketplace.

widgets.name: Registered buyers
widgets.description: This is total number of registered buyers from across local, state and federal government.

widgets.name: Approved suppliers
widgets.description: This is the total number of digital businesses registered as sellers in the Digital Marketplace.
